name: Kinetic Crafting
text: You can use your wild talents to help you craft magic items.
benefit: When crafting a magic item or taking item creation feats, you can treat your kineticist level as your caster level. In addition, you can treat any wild talent you have as a spell of the same level or lower for the purpose of fulfilling the requirements for magic item creation (except spell-completion and spell-trigger items). This wild talent must be associated with the same element or deal the same type of energy damage as the emulated spell’s descriptor.
text_zh: 你可以使用你的原力来协助你制造魔法物品。
benefit_zh: 当你之座一个魔法物品或者选择制造物品专长时，你将你的操念使等级视为你的施法者等级。除此之外，在满足魔法物品的制作条件时，你可以将任何你拥有的原力视为相等等级或者更低等级的法术（除了法术完成型和法术触发型物品）。该原力相关的元素类型必须与模拟的法术描述符中的的元素类型相同，或者造成相同类型的元素伤害。
